title: ELECOM Wireless track ball mouse 6 button Black M-XT3DRBK
body:
Has anyone setup the  Elecom M-XT3DRBK trackball button functionality for successful in game use?
I have setup buttons for ...

* Center Button Arbitrary key [D]
* Button 4: Arbitrary key [2]
* Button 5: Arbitrary key [1]
* Button 6: Arbitrary key [4]

The problem is ... the arbitrary buttons do not work in game, but work in all other applications.
Has anyone resolved this problem?  Have a fix or suggestion?  
Thanks in advance

PS: I switched from Logitech 570 and the button mapping works fine with that track ball.

replies.body:
Are you using a specific application to configure those keys to the buttons on the Elecom mouse? If so, try launching both the application you're using to configure the mouse **AND** League as admin. Simply right-click the application and select *run as administrator*. 

Let me know if this worked.

Went back and tried it with League and Elecom software both as admin, no luck
The oddity is that, when i open word or a browser or other app and I click the buttons they display the corresponding key.
In the league chat windows etc. the buttons do not display the corresponding key like in other applications.
Side note: prior to client beta the corresponding keys would display in these boxes but not work in game.  Im at a loss.
That's unfortunate. Are you configuring everything from the Mouse's software side, or have you made any modifications to the League files in order to attempt to get this working?
